abstract: Luis Lopez of Queens is charged with attempted murder, arson and related criminal counts after law enforcement officials say he set fire to block of homes in Woodhaven section in retaliation for being evicted from his apartment.
lead_paragraph: Luis Lopez, 30, was charged with starting a fire that destroyed eight homes on Wednesday night, just minutes after his landlord evicted him, the authorities said.

headline.main: Evicted Tenant Started Queens Fire, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Evicted Tenant Started Fire, Officials Say

snippet: Luis Lopez, 30, was charged with starting a fire that destroyed eight homes on Wednesday night, just minutes after his landlord evicted him, the authorities said.
